jobs_results.title: SAP Senior Systems Analyst
jobs_results.description: Responsibilities: · Manage multiple projects and is responsible for the execution from initiation to completion. · Determine the project goals to ensure that the project supports business objectives and strategies. · Develop project plans that include requirements, scope, deliverables, budget and schedules. · Define project tasks and resource requirements and to achieve optimal utilization of resources. · Manage the risks that affect the delivery of the project outcome. · Track project deliverables and ensure that the projects are completed within budget, schedules and quality standards. · Implement process improvements to reduce development time and assist in the integration of complex business factors to implement long-term strategic planning objectives. · Present reports and project updates to stakeholders on a regular basis. Requirements : · At least 5 years of relevant hands-on experience in project management of large-scale projects. · At least 5 years of experience in SAP... FI/MM/HRIS/ISH projects with ABAP programming skill or system maintenance preferable. · Strong interpersonal skills with the ability to work with different groups of stakeholders. · Possess leadership qualities. · Experience in the healthcare industry is an added advantage. · CITPM / PMP certification will be preferred. · Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or equivalent. An attractive remuneration package awaits those who are successful. Interested applicants, please send your updated resume in MS Word format to (Reg No : R1103690) and state your availability. We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified. EPS Consultants Pte Ltd (Licence No : 95C5630) Responsibilities: · Manage multiple projects and is responsible for the execution from initiation to completion. · Determine the project goals to ensure that the project supports business objectives Skills: Business Analysis, Business Intelligence, Integration, Project Management, Requirements Analysis, Sap, Sap Fico, Sap Mm, Sdlc, Software Development, Sql, Scope, Schedule, initiation Experience: 5.00-7.00 Years

jobs_results.title: Systems Analyst – Sharepoint and .Net
Lecturer - Business Information Systems
jobs_results.description:
The Institute of Technical Education is a globally-recognised world-class institution for excellence in technical education. Here, you make an extraordinary difference because ours is a unique Hands-on, Minds-on, Hearts-on College Education. Our awards include the prestigious Singapore Quality Award with Special Commendation and the inaugural Harvard-IBM Innovations Award in Transforming Government, affirmations of transformational leadership and passionate staff who bring us closer to becoming a Global Leader for Innovations in Technical Education.

Responsibilities

As a Lecturer, your contributions go beyond teaching and facilitating learning. You play a critical role in recognising and nurturing your students’ potential and their lifelong learning needs. In addition, you will carry out industry or consultancy projects to help you remain relevant in your profession and to evolving changes in industry, and maintain strong linkages with industry and schools. You will also have the... opportunity to have industry attachments or experience on a regular basis to update your skills, knowledge and practices of your profession. Those with good and relevant experience can look forward to Senior Lecturer or equivalent positions, with career development opportunities to leadership positions in the Colleges or Headquarters.

Requirements

You should trained in Information Technology or related disciplines, with preferably three years of relevant work experience in Information Technology related areas such as PC Support & Maintenance, CCNA Networking, Server Administration, Virtualization, Database Applications Development, Business Enterprise Systems.

You should also have a CCNA / SCJP / SCSA / MCAD / MCSA / MCITP / VMware VCP certification and knowledge and skills in at least two or more of the following areas:
- Enterprise Resource Management Systems, e.g. SAP, Oracle Applications, Microsoft Navision and etc.
- Network Infrastructure such as Cisco Routers and Switches
- Relational Database Management Systems, e.g. MySQL, Oracle and MS SQL.
- Application Development using languages such as Java, VB.NET and PHP
- System Administration and Virtualization, e.g. Windows Server, Solaris and Linux

Applicants may check their application status at the end of 8 weeks from the closing date of this job posting

jobs_results.title: System Analyst - Senior System Analyst - NET
jobs_results.description:
Job Description

• Perform system analysis, design and testing according to the project goal and needs

• Gather requirements from users, designing,

• implementing, maintaining application systems and project management.

• Deploy, maintain, and troubleshoot core business applications, including application servers, associated hardware, endpoints, and databases

• Meet and coordinate with internal and external stakeholders to establish project scope, system goals, and requirements

• Develop, analyze, prioritize, and organize requirement specifications, data mapping, diagrams, and flowcharts for developers and testers to follow

• Translate highly technical specifications into clear non-technical requirements

Requirement

• Minimally 2 years of working experience with DB2 and MS SQL Server databases.

• Atleast 4 years of hands on experience in development of Pega PRPC and Pega frameworks.

• Experience in handling projects in the open systems or mainframe environment with... relational databases (such as DB2, Oracle).

• Good to have: Java, JavaScript, HTML/ CSS, Web Services (REST and/or SOAP) / PEGA PRPC configuration, installation, external systems interface and database integration / PEGA PRPC Production BAU Support.

• Preferred:

o Pega PRPC CSA/CSSA/CLSA certification will be an added advantage.

• Able to work independently in gathering requirements from users, designing, implementing, maintaining application systems and project management

Interested candidates please click Apply Now or send your resume to . We regret to inform you that only shortlisted candidates will be contacted for further interviews.

Thomas Wong JunXiang

Accounts Manager

BGC Group Pte Ltd

EA License No: 05C3053

Registration ID: R1989416

jobs_results.title: Oracle-Business System Analyst
jobs_results.description:
Company Description

Accion Labs is a global technology services firm with offering a full range of product life-cycle services in the emerging technology segment. This includes Web 2.0, Open Source, SaaS/Cloud, Mobility, IT Operations Management/ITSM, Big Data and traditional BI/DW.

Through nine global offices and a rapid-response delivery model, Accion offers a range of engagement models such as turn-key projects, extended-teams, shared-IP development, offshore-leveraged engagements and professional staffing (contract, contract-to-hire & direct perm).

Role: - Project Manager

Required

· Have managed large transformational Mainframe platform migration / re-hosting projects

· Understanding of Mainframe application related to infra needs

· Knowledge and understanding of UX / Linux

· Should have hands-on experience in projects

· Strong project management skills. PMP certification is an added advantage

· Have run a large complex project of at least 5m++

· Ability in managing and... handling 3P vendors providing application porting services and workload solutions services.

· Experience in contract administrations

· Ability in managing cross-country / regional / virtualization resources in projects

· Managing at CxO level customer

Job Description

Oracle-Business System Analyst
Job Description
• 2-4 years IT experience in Oracle-BEA WebLogic App server, Oracle Enteprise Service Bus
• Preferred Skills - Oracle Weblogic and Oracle products, Java (Need to support common services built on Oracle Middleware i.e. OSB, ODI, UCM, Java etc) Also need to know Java, OSB and Oracle report.
Responsibilities
• Gather, analyze and formalize user’s business requirements and processes, evaluate on feasibility of implementation and manage scope of project.
• Prepare project documentation such as Requirement Specifications/Use Case Specifications etc Adhere to project scope, update requirement traceability matrix, inform and record out-of-scope issues.
• Develop technical design specification and translate technical design into process/program specification. Involve in the design review session.
• Make changes to configurable items, which include hardware, software, documentation, etc.
• Participate in Coding and Code Review.
• Assist in the integration testing, system testing, User Acceptance Test & implementation activities.
• Prepare user manual and operations manual, and plan & facilitate training of users and operators.
• Provide post implementation support (including production support and service requests).
• Escalate and discuss critical issues such as scope creep with the relevant managers.
• Conduct requirement gathering sessions. Conduct gap analysis of current business process to identify improvement opportunities.

Additional Information

All your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines

jobs_results.title: Manager, IT Programme Management (Tech Analyst)
jobs_results.description:
Sentosa Development Corporation (SDC) was established on 1 September 1972 as a Statutory Board under the Ministry of Trade and Industry. Its charter since inception has been to oversee the development, management and promotion of the Sentosa Island as a resort destination for locals and tourists. Under the care of SDC, the island went through a makeover to become a premier getaway with multi-faceted appeal. From business conventions to beach parties, Sentosa caters to an extensive range of needs and interests. SDC has evolved and grown over the years. It currently oversees the following business and commercial units – Sentosa Leisure Management Pte Ltd, Sentosa Golf Club, Sentosa Cove Resort Management Pte Ltd and Mount Faber Leisure Group.

JOB RESPONSIBILITIES
• You will be responsible for
• Working in a team and providing Operation and Support requirements for the SDF and its business partners
• One or more of SDF’s systems which can span across On-Premise and the Cloud including
•... Administration of User Profile and Access Permission
• Providing IT systems setup and installation such as Move / Add / Change
• Keeping Track of hardware inventory / software licenses
• Perform periodic review on hardening, logs, patching for Windows and on-premise servers and ongoing vulnerability management
• Attend to Incident / Service Request and fulfill SDF’s SLA requirements
• Ensure system & data backup are in place
• Create / Review / Update system documentation including configuration & schematic diagrams
• Monitoring SIEM activities
• Support for readiness of Audit, BCP, DR and VAPT on systems
• Provide necessary support to PMO team on new projects:
• Provide advice on system infrastructure issues encountered in new IT project initiatives
• Validate and ensure new setup is in accordance to corporate policy and standards before the handover to business users.
• Suggest and recommend improvements in existing production in areas of Fault Tolerance, Administration & routine maintenance tasks, access control and identity management, backup & restoration and monitoring of resources utilization.
• Participate in all phases of product development life cycle including design, development, testing, debugging, documentation and post go-live support.
• Liaising with cross-functional business users and IT partners on bugs, enhancement and feature requests for supported systems.
• Trouble-shooting and delivering technical level root-cause analysis, proposing creative and scalable solutions and considering code optimizations, cost effectiveness, risk, practicality, technical limitations and criticality.
• Support integration and application deployment requests for supported systems initiated via Change Requests
• Read and analyze system logs of supported systems to escalate to the relevant teams where necessary
• Support Data extraction/analytical requests, analytical report development and enhancements.
• Develop documentation for technical processes/procedures.
• Ensure systems adhere to Audit, Compliance and Risk guidelines.

COMPETENCIES
• Degree in Computer Science or a related field from an accredited tertiary with 3-5 years of relevant work experience in a similar or related field.
• Hands-on experience across IT Infrastructure landscape components from PC, Server, Network, Storage, Database and Cloud ecosystems.
• Good communication, problem-solving skills and experience in supporting complex projects, liaising with cross-functional business users and vendors.
• Effectiveness with time management, priority setting and meeting deadlines.
• Experience in cloud services and tools like AWS, Microsoft Azure or Google Cloud platform is an advantage.
• Knowledge in SIEM, JAVA/J2EE, JSP, C++, Nodejs, JavaScript framework, HTML5, CSS, Web services API Integration (JSON REST, SOAP), shell scripting is an advantage.
• Willingness to learn and support systems developed in-house.
• Working experience in a Centre of Excellence PMO environment is an advantage.
• Must be willing to work outside normal business hours where necessary

jobs_results.title: System Analyst - SGUnitedTraineeships - SGUP
jobs_results.description:
Job Purpose

To provide ABAP development and support to SAP Modules and to provide the support the business on their requests in configuration changes, roles changes and support on the month end and year end activities.

Duties and Responsibilities
• To support and develop the enhancements requested from the Business Users,
• To support the Fiori development
• To work with Project Management to support the projects initiated by Business Users.
• To review the programs developed by the peers.
• To provide daily functional and business support to the Business Users.

Qualifications and Work Experience

Qualifications include:
• Degree/ Diploma holder with minimum
• Professional Certification from recognized national organizations

Skills and Competencies

Technical skills include:
• ABAP
• Fiori

Generic skills include:
• Good Communication and problem solving skills

Duration of Traineeship: 6 months from date of commencement

Approved Training Allowance:

Fresh Graduates... $2,500/mth

Non-Mature Mid-Career Individuals: $2,700/mth

Mature Mid-Career Individuals - $3,500/mth

This position is open for both recent graduates and mid-career individuals (mature and non mature). Graduates interested in this position should possess a Degree Qualification . Mid-career individuals from any qualification level can apply

jobs_results.title: Management Information System Analyst (MGR/AVP), Service Analytics & Quality, Commercial Service Centre, Global Wholesale Banking Corporate Office
jobs_results.description:
As Singapore's longest established local bank, we are constantly on the lookout for exceptional individuals to join our team.

As a Singapore Quality Class (SQC), Singapore Service Class (S-Class) and People Developer (PD) certified department by Enterprise Singapore, you can be assured that Commercial Service Centre is committed to invest and develop our people.

If you are a go-getter with high level of drive to gain hands-on experience in a thriving and supportive workplace, do come and join us today.
• Manage department's information repository via touchpoints and CRM
• Analyse and report on volume & capacity trends, shrinkage, service performances and SLA adherence
• Provide valuable insights from data to support business/product directives and cost management
• Improve metrics for operational excellence, including service levels, adherence, forecast versus actual variance and occupancy
• Work as a team contact for incident management - check call/touchpoint drivers, coordinate... with teams and update stakeholders
• Manage root cause analysis when service goals are missed
• Manage schedules and daily exceptions to ensure efficient staffing to achieve agreed service targets
• Work closely with internal stakeholders with required data & analysis to processes

Requirements

Qualifications
• At least Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics or related field or equivalent
• At least 4 years of related work experience
• Strong working knowledge and experience in data management & analytics
• Knowledge and proficiency in at least Excel Macros, data programming & visualisation tools. Proficiency in workforce management tools is advantageous but not essential
• Strong project management skills and attention to detail
• Passionate about customer service with excellent problem solving, communication & collaboration skills to work at all levels
• Ability to think independently and to work under pressure

options.text: Crédit Agricole Corporate and Investment Bank
